content.description: Move up on small holds to a bulge.  step up and throw for a good ledge.  Traverse the ledge on horrible feet.  Try to hang on as the ledge goes vertical.  Throw for a good crimped.  Mantle the ledge, and make your way up the left side of an off width to the anchors.
content.location: Just right of the funny side of crazy.  Identified by the party ledge that swoops vertical

content.description: Starts in a dirty wide crack, and continues up left to a ledge where you grovel your way up a "butterflying" dihedral for 25 reef.
content.protection: Med to large pro.  Accepts BD#4 & 5's

content.description: Start on good holds make your way to big flake. Pinch and make your way up the flake topping out, and mantling to anchors.
content.location: Just Right of "Peter Pan wore a Tampon".

content.description: Fun moves up a left angled seam then out to the arete then up the face.  Technique required.

Start on good ledges leading up to a roof.  make your way to the end of a vertically rising ledge, Huck for a left handed, in-cut, positive full pad crimper.  Expect the worse!!! This is a full body cut hanging from one hand kinda move.  If you stick it, clip and make your way through tough movement to a party ledge.  Stand and clip the anchors and thank someone.
content.location: Just right of Turn and cough.  Identified by the enormous party ledge 50 feet up.

content.description: Hard to start block, move up on good ledges over small bulge.  Take a break on the ledge before making a ass puckering fall out move to a good holds.  Make your way up a good slab to a weird side pull anchor clipping stance.
content.location: first route to the right of "1st sport Route" appox 30 feet left.

content.description: Crack Climb up left leaning and with various pro, continue up to big flake, make your way to the finger crack just before the anchors.
content.protection: small to med pro with BD#3 at the flake
content.location: starts just left of Chocolate Messia.

content.description: Start with good ledges up to a tricky move, over a bulge to a slaby good time, and finish off with arete climbing for 25 feet.
content.location: Right of Cincinnati Bowtie and left if Organic orgasm

content.description: Starts at the ramp like block and continues up to a very spaced fourth bolt.  Easy movement but scary.  Make your way through tough movements to good holds
content.protection: 7 bolts to a new 2 bolt anchor
content.location: Look for the large ramp block. Just left of The funny side of crazy. Can use the anchors to rap in.
